attributes.action: For all MPs to sacrifice their salary & pension contributions for 6 months.
attributes.additional_details: Many members of our society have lost their source of income as a result of the lockdown measures. These 'sacrifices' have been forced on individuals by MPs who were elected and therefore have a guaranteed salary for the duration of this Parliament. In a show of solidarity I invite all MPs to sacrifice their income & pension contribution for a period of 6 months so they can experience the economic suffering they are inflicting on the rest of society.
attributes.background: For all MPs to sacrifice their salary (& pension contribution) for a period of 6 month as a symbol of solidarity with those who have lost their job/business as a result of the lock down.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. The Independent Parliamentary Standards Authority (IPSA) is responsible for deciding on MPs' expenses and pay. IPSA is independent of both Parliament and Government.

You can find out how to contact IPSA here:

http://www.theipsa.org.uk/about-us/contact-us/

Decisions about whether MPs should individually give up their salary are a matter for individually MPs.
